location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: This letter relays accounts received from the broker at Katife [Al-Qatif]. According to the broker, the young pretender to the Wahabee [Wahhābī] chieftainship is expected daily at Saheessa. William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, reports that the former Governor of Katife, Shaik Saddoon, son of Shaik Mohomed, has marched with a force to bring about the return of pilgrims from Mocha who were detained by Bedouins at Arriza.
